newsitem.title: USA: Leading Edge Packaging Inc Q2 results.
newsitem.headline: Leading Edge Packaging Inc Q2 results.

text.p: Leading Edge Packaging Inc said on Friday net income for the six month period ended September 30, 1996 was $995,084, or $0.51 per share, on 1,875,000 shares outstanding at that time.
Net sales for the same six month period were $5,551,181.

On December 2 1996 Leading Edge completed an initial public offering for 1,437,500 shares at $6 per share. Inclusive of the offering, Leading Edge's current total shares outstanding are 3,312,500, which on a pro-forma basis for the first six month period equate to earnings of $O.29 per share.
Leading Edge sells and distributes packaging products in North America.
